'''Mondstadt Grilled Fish''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Mondstadt Grilled Fish is available from the start of the game.

Depending on the quality, Mondstadt Grilled Fish revives and restores '''50'''/'''100'''/'''150''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Diona|Definitely Not Bar Food!}}
